title.narrative: Strengthening Social Protection to mitigate HIV, AIDs and poverty

description.narrative: HelpAge aims to work in partnership and alliances to deliver a four year programme to contribute to universal, access to HIV and AIDS services and social protection for vulnerable groups in sub-Saharan Africa. The expected results will be achieved through combined approaches linking grassroots service delivery to vulnerable groups with national and regional policy influencing processes. It will build the capacity of civil society organizations (CSOs) to effectively engage in social protection policy dialogue, design and implementation of social protection programmers. The programme will also focus on building evidence for effective policy action, promoting networking and learning among civil society, government, and research and academic institutions.

participating-org.narrative: Coalition on Children Affected by AIDS (CCABA)
Muthade Society for the Aged (MUSA), South Africa
SCAZ - Senior Citizen's Association of Zambia

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
